ComicInfo.Summary:
Frontline: The boys play war in Drac's living room.
Identity Crisis: While playing with one of Jackie's inventions, the boys are shifted from dimension to dimension.
Old Debts: The boys travel with Drac's father to the South Pole and battle killer penguins to find Frankenstein's Monster.
ComicInfo.Title: Frontline; Identity Crisis; Old Debts
